rukus.text: 15|61|Pas, hangome ki faristagon [-i Alloh taolo ʙa sakli inson] nazdi xonadoni Lut omadand
15|63|[Faristagon] Guftand: «Balki mo hamon cizero ʙarojat ovardaem, ki [in mardumi gunahgor] dar ʙoraas tardid mekardand [nuzuli azoʙ]
15|64|Va mo ʙarojat [xaʙari haqiqi va] rost ovardaem va hatman, mo rostguem
15|65|Pas, pose az saʙ [ki guzast] xonavodaatro ʙo xud [az in co] ʙiʙar va [xudat] ʙa dunʙolason ʙirav va hec jak az sumo pusti sarasro nigoh nakunad va ʙa coje, ki ʙa sumo farmon medihand, ʙiraved»
15|66|Va Mo u [Lut]-ro az in amr ogoh kardem, ki suʙhgohon resai onon kanda xohad sud
15|67|Va ahli sahr, dar hole ki [dar ʙorai omadani afrodi cadid] ʙo sodi [ʙa jakdigar] xaʙar medodand, [ʙa suji xonai Lut] omadand
15|68|[Lut] Guft: «Inho mehmononi man hastand, pas, maro rasvo [va sarmandai mehmononam] nakuned
15|69|Va az Alloh taolo ʙitarsed va sarsikastaam nasozed»
15|70|[Onon] Guftand: «Magar mo turo az [mizʙonii] afrodi [ƣariʙ] nahj nakardem»
15|71|[Lut] Guft: «Agar mexohed, [kore halol] ancom dihed, inho duxtaroni [ummati] man hastand [ʙo eson izdivoc kuned]»
15|72|Savgand ʙa coni tu [ej pajomʙar], ki onon dar mastii xes sargasta ʙudand
15|73|Pas, hangomi ʙaromadani oftoʙ ʙongi [margʙor] ononro faro girift
15|74|On goh on [sarzamin]-ro zeruru kardem va ʙar onon sanggilhoe pajopaj ʙoridem
15|75|Ba jaqin, dar in [kajfar] ʙaroi husjoron iʙrathost
15|76|Va on [sahrhoi vajrona hanuz] ʙar sari rohi [musofiron] poʙarcost
15|77|Jaqinan, dar in [azoʙ] nisonahoe ʙaroi [iʙrat giriftani] mu'minon ast
15|78|Va ashoʙi Ajka [qavmi Suajʙ], hatman, sitamgor ʙudand
15|79|Pas, [Mo] az onon intiqom giriftem va [sahrhoi vajronsudai] in du [qavm] ʙar sari roh oskor ast
